attributes.contentHtml:
Hello this is my first post/complaint, I found this host that is Spanish but I will try to translate, you have to see the garbage that is, start by saying that they advertise through spam md haha in more than 5 servers host that I am reported them, plus they do not even have a website, with that I say it all. No cough, no nothing.
They offer paid services without having a web page or rules, and let's get to the best part, conversations.


We start with this creator saying that they have documentation to sell and be a company.

Then he ends up talking to me and my colleague one of his admins to the MD saying that they don't have them and that they are not a company and that they have nothing.

Anyway, every time there are more and more dumb kids creating this and wow they give so much mockery haha.

attributes.title: Arceus Nodes - company but no company. silly children
